content:
Welcome to #MiHIN Public Health Reporting.

Description: Dental Referral: Test SMART-on-FHIR app to demonstrate collection of patient/provider data and ability to submit dental referral to Michigan Dental Registry for dentist to review

Electronic Death Reporting with Notification & Disease Surveillance Alert: Test SMART-on-FHIR app to collect and send cause of death information from EHR to Michigan Death Registry (EDRS)

Electronic Birth Reporting with Birth Defect: Leverage EHR-integrated IHE profile to capture and submit newborn birth certificate information to Michigan’s Birth Certification System (WebEBC) and submit birth defect data to Michigan’s Birth Defect Registry (MBDR)
